short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The mini Bluesky app for your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Minisky is your lightweight companion for Bluesky social, bringing your feed right to your browser toolbar. Check posts, interactions, and notifications instantly without leaving your current tab. Perfect for quick glances at your timeline, this mini app loads faster than the full website and lets you stay connected while browsing elsewhere. Streamline your Bluesky experience with this efficient, easy-to-use extension.

Features:
- Quick access to Bluesky from any tab
- Faster loading than the full website
- Clean, minimalist interface
- Easy timeline checking on the go

**Changelog**:
2024/12/05: You can now specify a PDS when signing in.
